title: Main  Concerns about Evelynn Rework:
body:
1- Loss of stealth until lvl 6: Earlygame is when her passive holds almost all of its use, this is basically a way of "ninja" removing her stealth.
There was no need for this, even more considering how cheap control wards are now, this pretty much kills her playstyle. But if you wanted to nerf this, there were less destructive ways, like increasing the detect range in early levels.

2- Removing mana regeneration on passive: HP regen is just less useful for her in the jungle, considering how many ways of regaining hp there are, though this is lower in importance than the other changes, probably her spells will be cheaper to compensate.

3- Removal of AD scaling: Honestly, being one of the very, very few hybrid champions was the selling point for which i bought her, losing the build flexibility is just a sad thing.

Being hybrid along with the playstyles that opened with early stealth,  just makes her in a very onedimensional champion to use.
